mapper.select: SELECT tbl_project.project_no as projectNo, tbl_project.project_title as projectTitle, tbl_project.project_content as projectContent, tbl_project.project_end as projectEnd, tbl_project_partemp.emp_code as empCode, tbl_document_type.document_type_code as documentTypeCode, tbl_document.document_date as documentDate FROM tbl_project JOIN tbl_project_partemp ON tbl_project_partemp.project_no = tbl_project.project_no JOIN tbl_document_type ON tbl_document_type.document_type_code = tbl_project.document_type_code JOIN tbl_document ON tbl_document.document_type_code = tbl_document_type.document_type_code
